verses.verse: (A Maskil of Asaph.) Listen,<WH238> O my people,<WH5971> to my instruction;<WH8451> Incline<WH5186> your ears<WH241> to the words<WH561> of my mouth.<WH6310>
I will open<WH6605> my mouth<WH6310> in a parable;<WH4912> I will utter<WH5042> dark<WH2420> sayings<WH2420> of old,<WH6924>
Which<WH834> we have heard<WH8085> and known,<WH3045> And our fathers have told<WH1> us.

We will not conceal<WH3582> them from their children,<WH1121> But tell<WH5608> to the generation<WH1755> to come<WH314> the praises<WH8416> of the Lord,<WH3068> And His strength<WH5807> and His wondrous<WH6381> works<WH6381> that He has done.<WH6213>

For He established<WH6965> a testimony<WH5715> in Jacob,<WH3290> And appointed<WH7760> a law<WH8451> in Israel,<WH3478> Which<WH834> He commanded<WH6680> our fathers, That they should teach<WH1> them to their children,<WH3045>
That the generation<WH1755> to come<WH314> might know,<WH3045> [even] the children<WH1121> [yet] to be born,<WH3205> [That] they may arise<WH6965> and tell<WH5608> [them] to their children,<WH1121>
That they should put<WH7760> their confidence<WH3689> in God,<WH430> And not forget<WH7911> the works<WH4611> of God,<WH410> But keep<WH5341> His commandments,<WH4687>

And not be like their fathers, A stubborn<WH1> and rebellious<WH5637> generation,<WH4784> A generation<WH1755> that did not prepare<WH1755> its heart,<WH3559> And whose spirit<WH3820> was not faithful<WH7307> to God.<WH539>
The sons<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> were archers<WH9556> equipped<WH9349> with bows,<WH7198> [Yet] they turned<WH2015> back<WH2015> in the day<WH3117> of battle.<WH7128>
They did not keep<WH8104> the covenant<WH1285> of God,<WH430> And refused<WH3985> to walk<WH1980> in His law;<WH8451>
And they forgot<WH7911> His deeds,<WH5949> And His miracles<WH6381> that He had shown<WH7200> them.
He wrought<WH6213> wonders<WH6382> before<WH5048> their fathers, In the land<WH1> of Egypt,<WH776> in the field<WH4714> of Zoan.<WH7704>
He divided<WH1234> the sea,<WH3220> and caused them to pass<WH5674> through;<WH5674> And He made the waters<WH4325> stand<WH5324> up like<WH3644> a heap.<WH5067>
Then He led<WH5148> them with the cloud<WH6051> by day,<WH3119> And all<WH3605> the night<WH3915> with a light<WH216> of fire.<WH784>
He split<WH1234> the rocks<WH6697> in the wilderness,<WH4057> And gave<WH8248> [them] abundant<WH7227> drink<WH8248> like the ocean<WH8415> depths.<WH8415>
He brought<WH3318> forth<WH3318> streams<WH5140> also from the rock,<WH5553> And caused waters<WH4325> to run<WH3381> down<WH3381> like rivers.<WH5104>
Yet they still<WH5750> continued<WH3254> to sin<WH2398> against Him, To rebel<WH4784> against the Most<WH9411> High<WH9411> in the desert.<WH6723>
And in their heart<WH3824> they put<WH5254> God<WH410> to the test<WH5254> By asking<WH7592> food<WH3978> according to their desire.<WH5315>
Then they spoke<WH1696> against God;<WH430> They said,<WH559> "Can<WH3201> God<WH410> prepare<WH6186> a table<WH7979> in the wilderness<WH4057>?

"Behold,<WH2005> He struck<WH5221> the rock,<WH6697> so that waters<WH4325> gushed<WH2100> out, And streams<WH5158> were overflowing;<WH7857> Can<WH3201> He give<WH5414> bread<WH3899> also<WH1571>? Will He provide<WH3559> meat<WH7607> for His people<WH5971>?"

Therefore<WH3651> the Lord<WH3068> heard<WH8085> and was full<WH9378> of wrath,<WH9378> And a fire<WH784> was kindled<WH9610> against Jacob,<WH3290> And anger<WH639> also<WH1571> mounted<WH5927> against Israel;<WH3478>
Because<WH3588> they did not believe<WH539> in God,<WH430> And did not trust<WH982> in His salvation.<WH3444>
Yet He commanded<WH6680> the clouds<WH7834> above,<WH4480> <WH4605> And opened<WH6605> the doors<WH1817> of heaven;<WH8064>
And He rained<WH4305> down<WH4305> manna<WH4478> upon them to eat,<WH398> And gave<WH5414> them food<WH1715> from heaven.<WH8064>
Man<WH376> did eat<WH398> the bread<WH3899> of angels;<WH47> He sent<WH7971> them food<WH6720> in abundance.<WH7648>
He caused the east<WH6921> wind<WH6921> to blow<WH5265> in the heavens;<WH8064> And by His power<WH5797> He directed<WH5090> the south<WH8486> wind.<WH8486>
When He rained<WH4305> meat<WH7607> upon them like the dust,<WH6083> Even winged<WH3671> fowl<WH5775> like the sand<WH2344> of the seas,<WH3220>
Then He let [them] fall<WH5307> in the midst<WH7130> of their camp,<WH4264> Round<WH5439> about<WH5439> their dwellings.<WH4908>
So they ate<WH398> and were well<WH3966> filled;<WH7646> And their desire<WH8378> He gave<WH935> to them.
Before they had satisfied<WH2114> their desire,<WH8378> While<WH5750> their food<WH400> was in their mouths,<WH6310>
The anger<WH639> of God<WH430> rose<WH5927> against them, And killed<WH2026> some of their stoutest<WH9304> ones, And subdued<WH3766> the choice<WH970> men<WH977> of Israel.<WH3478>
In spite of all<WH3605> this<WH384> they still<WH5750> sinned,<WH2398> And did not believe<WH539> in His wonderful<WH6381> works.<WH6381>
So He brought<WH3615> their days<WH3117> to an end<WH3615> in futility,<WH1892> And their years<WH8141> in sudden<WH928> terror.<WH928>
When<WH518> He killed<WH2026> them, then they sought<WH1875> Him, And returned<WH7725> and searched<WH7836> diligently<WH7836> for God;<WH410>
And they remembered<WH2142> that God<WH430> was their rock,<WH6697> And the Most<WH9411> High<WH9411> God<WH410> their Redeemer.<WH1350>
But they deceived<WH6601> Him with their mouth,<WH6310> And lied<WH3576> to Him with their tongue.<WH3956>
For their heart<WH3820> was not steadfast<WH3559> toward<WH5973> Him, Nor<WH3808> were they faithful<WH539> in His covenant.<WH1285>

But He, being compassionate,<WH7349> forgave<WH3722> [their] iniquity,<WH5771> and did not destroy<WH7843> [them]; And often<WH7235> He restrained<WH7725> His anger,<WH639> And did not arouse<WH5782> all<WH3605> His wrath.<WH2534>
Thus He remembered<WH2142> that they were but flesh,<WH1320> A wind<WH7307> that passes<WH1980> and does not return.<WH7725>
How<WH4100> often<WH4100> they rebelled<WH4784> against Him in the wilderness,<WH4057> And grieved<WH6087> Him in the desert!<WH3452>
And again<WH7725> and again they tempted<WH5254> God,<WH410> And pained<WH8428> the Holy<WH6918> One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>
They did not remember<WH2142> His power,<WH3027> The day<WH3117> when<WH834> He redeemed<WH6299> them from the adversary,<WH6862>
When<WH834> He performed<WH7760> His signs<WH226> in Egypt,<WH4714> And His marvels<WH4159> in the field<WH7704> of Zoan,<WH6814>
And turned<WH2015> their rivers<WH2975> to blood,<WH1818> And their streams,<WH5140> they could not drink.<WH8354>
He sent<WH7971> among them swarms<WH6157> of flies,<WH6157> which devoured<WH398> them, And frogs<WH6854> which destroyed<WH7843> them.
He gave<WH5414> also their crops<WH2981> to the grasshopper,<WH2625> And the product<WH3018> of their labor<WH3018> to the locust.<WH697>
He destroyed<WH2026> their vines<WH1612> with hailstones,<WH1259> And their sycamore<WH8256> trees<WH8256> with frost.<WH2602>
He gave<WH5462> over<WH5462> their cattle<WH1165> also to the hailstones,<WH1259> And their herds<WH4735> to bolts<WH7565> of lightning.<WH7565>
He sent<WH7971> upon them His burning<WH2740> anger,<WH639> Fury,<WH5678> and indignation,<WH2195> and trouble,<WH6869> A band<WH4917> of destroying<WH7451> angels.<WH4397>
He leveled<WH6424> a path<WH5410> for His anger;<WH639> He did not spare<WH2820> their soul<WH5315> from death,<WH4194> But gave<WH5462> over<WH5462> their life<WH9130> to the plague,<WH1698>
And smote<WH5221> all<WH3605> the first-born<WH7225> in Egypt,<WH4714> The first [issue] of their virility<WH202> in the tents<WH168> of Ham.<WH2526>
But He led<WH5265> forth<WH5265> His own people<WH5971> like sheep,<WH6629> And guided<WH5090> them in the wilderness<WH4057> like a flock;<WH5739>
And He led<WH5148> them safely,<WH983> so that they did not fear;<WH6342> But the sea<WH3220> engulfed<WH3680> their enemies.<WH340>
So He brought<WH935> them to His holy<WH6944> land,<WH1366> To this<WH2088> hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> which His right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> had gained.<WH7069>

He also drove<WH1644> out the nations<WH1471> before<WH4480> <WH6440> them, And He apportioned<WH5307> them for an inheritance<WH5159> by measurement,<WH9112> And made the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> dwell<WH7931> in their tents.<WH168>
Yet they tempted<WH5254> and rebelled<WH4784> against<WH854> the Most<WH9411> High<WH9411> God,<WH430> And did not keep<WH8104> His testimonies,<WH9381>
But turned<WH5472> back<WH5472> and acted<WH898> treacherously<WH898> like their fathers; They turned<WH1> aside<WH2015> like a treacherous<WH2015> bow.<WH7423>
For they provoked<WH3707> Him with their high<WH1116> places,<WH1116> And aroused His jealousy<WH7065> with their graven<WH6456> images.<WH6456>
When God<WH430> heard,<WH8085> He was filled<WH9378> with wrath,<WH9378> And greatly<WH3966> abhorred<WH3988> Israel;<WH3478>
So that He abandoned<WH5203> the dwelling<WH4908> place<WH4908> at Shiloh,<WH7887> The tent<WH168> which He had pitched<WH7931> among men,<WH120>
And gave<WH5414> up His strength<WH5797> to captivity,<WH7628> And His glory<WH8597> into the hand<WH3027> of the adversary.<WH6862>
He also delivered<WH5462> His people<WH5971> to the sword,<WH2719> And was filled<WH9378> with wrath<WH9378> at His inheritance.<WH5159>
Fire<WH784> devoured<WH398> His young<WH970> men;<WH970> And His virgins<WH1330> had no<WH3808> wedding<WH1984> songs.<WH1984>
His priests<WH3548> fell<WH5307> by the sword;<WH2719> And His widows<WH490> could not weep.<WH1058>
Then the Lord<WH136> awoke<WH3364> as [if from] sleep,<WH3463> Like a warrior<WH1368> overcome<WH9548> by wine.<WH3196>
And He drove<WH5221> His adversaries<WH6862> backward;<WH268> He put<WH5414> on them an everlasting<WH5769> reproach.<WH2781>
He also rejected<WH3988> the tent<WH168> of Joseph,<WH3130> And did not choose<WH977> the tribe<WH7626> of Ephraim,<WH669>
But chose<WH977> the tribe<WH7626> of Judah,<WH3063> Mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> which<WH834> He loved.<WH157>
And He built<WH1129> His sanctuary<WH4720> like<WH3644> the heights,<WH7311> Like the earth<WH776> which He has founded<WH3245> forever.<WH5769>
He also chose<WH977> David<WH1732> His servant,<WH5650> And took<WH3947> him from the sheepfolds<WH6629>;<WH4356>
From the care<WH310> of the ewes<WH5763> with suckling<WH5763> lambs<WH5763> He brought<WH935> him, To shepherd<WH7462> Jacob<WH3290> His people,<WH5971> And Israel<WH3478> His inheritance.<WH5159>
So he shepherded<WH7462> them according to the integrity<WH8537> of his heart,<WH3824> And guided<WH5148> them with his skillful<WH8394> hands.<WH3709>
